Easy to learn - very hard to master. I got pretty damn close to mastering it, before I discovered mother mary jane. Now, I almost exclusively play while I'm high as balls, and the game is still fun as fuck even though I suck. Through all my years playing this beaut of a game since late 2014, I would say it's always been a fun fucking time for me and my boys. I've only encountered a handful of blatant cheaters, perhaps a few more that kept it well hidden. I found that many of those that I hackusated were just better than me, and I was being a salty little bitch. Overall, would recommend.
